QuestData.Title: Securing Sinfall
QuestData.Description:
They're all still active...
The stoneborn, the gargon, the stone fiends... All of 'em!
Don't got much time. They're always watching.
<Breakfist points up.>
Vulca told me to follow that big beam of Light in the sky.
Goes to a tower guarded by a big old brute, though. Couldn't get in.
QuestData.LogDescription: Clear out Sinfall and make it safe for Theotar and the other venthyr.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that we have cleared out the Master's forces, let us continue the search for Prince Renathal!
